[00:03.35]Drake/PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[00:11.11]It's your f**kin' birthday
[00:15.89]It's a f**kin' celebration
[00:19.69]Tonight we celebrate
[00:21.84]Seems like time's out of our control
[00:28.27]It's a celebration oh oh
[00:34.25]It's your birthday baby it's your birthday yeah
[00:37.45]Who's gonna love you on your worst day
[00:39.94]You talk so tough I know you're soft like buttercups
[00:46.43]Reese's Reese's don't be ridiculous
[00:48.98]Just say your piece and peace up like Ibiza
[00:52.13]Cool your headtop you hotter than Anita
[00:54.90]Bakin' baby tell me where I need to
[00:59.19]To be to feel and fill
[01:02.84]That emptiness inside you
[01:06.56]Petty bullsh*t shouldn't excite you
[01:09.05]On your birthday
[01:10.85]Drake/PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[01:12.09]It's your brrrrrrr-
[01:13.69]It's your f**kin' birthday oh birthday happy birthday
[01:21.44]It's a f**kin' celebration oh oh
[01:25.21]Tonight we celebrate
[01:27.43]Seems like time's out of our control oh oh
[01:33.93]It's a celebration oh oh
[01:37.90]Drake：
[01:38.41]They tried it they went for it
[01:40.69]All year and you're still here just ignore it
[01:43.74]If it ain't the real thing you don't want it
[01:46.35]GG CC's all on ya
[01:49.96]It's your month and you know it and you know it
[01:52.38]And you know it's real don't gotta say it for you
[01:55.17]And you know somebody home prayin' for you
[01:58.01]You say play this sh*t they better play it ayy play it
[02:00.93]For you for you on time
[02:03.64]And I miss the days that you was all mine
[02:06.49]Haven't been official in a long time
[02:09.54]So tell me where I need to
[02:13.49]To be to feel and fill
[02:17.36]That emptiness inside you
[02:21.15]Petty bullsh*t shouldn't excite you
[02:23.70]On your birthday
[02:25.86]Drake/PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[02:26.39]It's your brrrrrrr-
[02:27.74]It's your f**kin' birthday oh birthday happy birthday
[02:35.86]It's a f**kin' celebration
[02:39.50]Tonight we celebrate
[02:41.73]Seems like time's out of our control
[02:48.25]It's a celebration oh oh
[02:52.77]PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[03:04.86]Oh it's your f**kin' birthday

[00:01.71]//

[00:11.11]今天是你的生日
[00:15.89]这是一场庆祝
[00:19.69]今晚我们庆祝
[00:21.84]似乎时间不受我们控制
[00:28.27]这是一场庆祝
[00:34.25]今天是你的生日 宝贝 今天是你的生日
[00:37.45]在你最落魄的日子 谁会爱你
[00:39.94]你说话强硬得很 我知道你其实很柔软 就像巧克力杯一样
[00:46.43]Reese's Reese's 别那么搞笑了
[00:48.98]倾吐你的不安 平静下来 就像伊比萨岛一样
[00:52.13]冷静一点 你比安妮塔都性感
[00:54.90]宝贝 告诉我 我该去哪儿
[00:59.19]去哪儿探索 去哪儿打发时间
[01:02.84]你心里空虚
[01:06.56]你不该为甜言蜜语感到激动
[01:09.05]在你的生日这一天

[01:12.09]今天是你的生

[01:38.41]他们费尽心机 他们目标坚定
[01:40.69]整年时间 你都在这里 无视所有
[01:43.74]如果那不是真货 你就不想要
[01:46.35]全身上下都是古奇 香奈儿
[01:49.96]这个月你火了 你知道 你知道
[01:52.38]你知道这都是真的 不用强调
[01:55.17]你知道家里有人为你祈祷
[01:58.01]只要你放话 谁敢不听
[02:00.93]谁敢不按你的要求做
[02:03.64]我怀念过去你属于我的日子
[02:06.49]已经很久没有这么正式了
[02:09.54]所以告诉我 我该去哪儿
